content: know how to juggle well with this pattern you can make your very own juggling balls to practice or even learn how to these juggling balls can fit perfectly in your hand when made with the indicated yarn and hook however if you want them smaller or larger you can use smaller or larger yarn respectively this pattern is not only fun because you get to use it after making it but it also gets you into the groove of using multiple color changes for future crochet work here s what you ll need -worsted weight yarn 4 red blue yellow & green -4mm crochet hook -scissors -stuffing -darning needle thank you so much for crocheting this pattern and have fun juggling
